description: Talk to Warrior to start the quest.

2.subtitle: The Leprechaun
2.step: Chop a tree to the west.

description: Chop this same tree as the picture and Shamus will appear. Unlike the other trees, it should have a 'Chop' option.

4.subtitle: Entrana
4.step: Climb down the ladders at Entrana. (Chat: 2)

description: Right-click a Monk of Entrana and take-boat to Entrana.

Entrana (weapons and armor are not allowed including the axe). Bank all weapons, armor and axe; but bring a knife, elemental runes or fletching supplies to make a bow and arrows, knives or darts to defeat a tree spirit (Level 101).

5.step: Kill a zombie until it drops a bronze axe.

description: Kill a zombie until it drops a bronze axe.

6.step: Chop the Draman tree and defeat Tree Spirit (level 101).

description: Defeat Tree Spirit (level 101). Can be safe-spotted behind the mushrooms.

7.step: Chop the branch and use the knife on the Dramen branch to make a Dramen staff.

description: Chop the branch and use the knife on the Dramen branch to make a Dramen staff. (Note: Chop another branch, DON'T FLETCH IT, if you plan doing Recipe of Disaster).

8.subtitle: Finishing up
8.step: Enter the tool shed with the Draman staff equipped.

description: Enter the tool shed with the Draman staff equipped to complete the quest.
